01.question: Do I need to create an account?
01.answer: No! You can create and share checklists instantly without signing up. However, creating an account lets you save your checklists permanently and access them from any device.

02.question: How do I reorder checklist items?
02.answer: Hover over any item and use the drag handle (≡) that appears on the left to drag and drop items into your preferred order. Changes are saved automatically.

03.question: Can I edit items inline?
03.answer: Yes! Click on any checklist item text to edit it directly. Changes are saved and synced automatically across all devices viewing the checklist.

04.question: How long do checklists stay active?
04.answer: Checklists without accounts stay active for 30 days. With a free account, they're saved permanently. You'll also get access to additional features like templates and team management.

05.question: Can multiple people edit the same checklist?
05.answer: Absolutely! That's one of our core features. Anyone with the link can view and edit the checklist in real-time. You'll see changes happen instantly as team members check off items.

06.question: How do I share a checklist?
06.answer: Click the 'Share' button on any checklist to get a unique link. You can also generate a QR code for easy mobile sharing. The checklist works on any device with a web browser.
